name: Wolf paradox
text:
Awesome pizza and service, been eating here for years
Before the virus outbreak it was the spot I would meet up with out of town friends for lunch

name: Keri Brewer
text: FINALLY! A notice when roma tomatoes are not in stocks instead of finding out you were charged & DIDNT get your third topping AFTER you've arrive home.

name: Bridget McDaniel
text: We ordered 2 medium pizzas and 2 items off of the 2 for $5 menu (pizza and wings). When we paid we ended up paying full price for the 2 for $5 pizza because the wing station was down. Instead of offering to make another pizza from the 2 for $5 menu we were charged full price as if it was our fault they couldnâ€™t make our wings.

name: Steve Taylor
text: Messed up our order didn't want to fix it

name: ShadowFarms Equines
text: Pizza was okay. It was made fresh and had good flavor. Service was outstanding. Logan was our server and he went above and beyond for me to get best deal and kept the drinks flowing while we ate. All I can say is Thank you.

name: Paul Jones
text: Great pizza and service! "Maria" was our server that kept a sharp eye to see that our drinks were filled. She kept us updated while our lunch was prepared. Pizza Hut should be proud to have such attentive employees. The two pizzas we â€¦More

name: Clancy R
text: Awesome young lady waited on us. Food was Pizza Hut tasty. Will be back.

name: Amy Schmitt
text: It was quiet and the service was good but the pizza was literally dripping in grease.

name: Grace Conner
text: Pizza was horrible,  but customer service was good. But if I'm going to spend $40-50 on something I should be saying  "yummm" after eating it!

name: Fae Cain
text: Pretty good pizza and wings, although wings were undercooked. I just nuked them when I got home. I like that I can call ahead and then use the drive thru. Did not like having to buy ranch since I purchased wings at other places and they â€¦More

name: TNF A
text: Not from here but I've heard terrible things about this place as a restaurant manager i always give people a chanceðŸ’œ my experience was great i went around 9pm was greeted by all the staff cheerful environment cute little pizza hut i heard â€¦More

name: Jody Houston
text: Great staff. Friendly. Fast and delicious

name: Stephanie Walker
text: The service was great the people were respectful and quick. The downfall is the pizza was a little undercooked and found multiple pieces of hair in my pizza. Also, my cinnamon sticks literally had CLUMPS of cinnamon on them.

name: Justin Harris
text: My meal was better than any other pizza hut store ive been to in years. My waitress was great.

name: Glenn Parker
text: Standard Pizza hut fare great pizza. We dined in and no tea was made and the wait staff was more interested in gabbing with each other than checking on patrons

name: Vanessa Lee
text: Food was good till the hair in pizza and manager didn't want to change anything . Said he would give a free pizza if a hair was found. Well No thanks. Hair nets or hats are good for reasons .

name: Paige Meredith
text: HORRIBLE!!! I went and half of the restaurant was filled with trash and boxes. They only gave us two straws for four people and we asked for straws four times and never got any more and never got an explanation. We also ordered cinnamon â€¦More

name: John Abbott
text: Pizza was very good & the service was very friendly & efficient.

name: Tina Balderas
text: Sometimes the people don't know what they are talking about. So if you are unsure of what they are saying ask for someone else

name: Anthony Jennings-Freeze
text: Love this place I just wish it still had the lunch buffet

name: Heather Hare
text: This Pizza Hut in Waldron is the worst Pizza Hut I have ever been to. They have messed up our order 5 or 6 times now and they are very rude. They never have pan crust and when u tell them to do hand tossed they give you thin crust pizza. Very disappointed.

name: Dustin Reynolds
text: Today it was freezing in there. They didn't have no sweet tea and had to send my wings back because they didn't have much sauce on them. Other than that it was ok.

name: Kevin K
text:
Pizza was good, but place needs deep cleaning. Even the menus were oily.
No entertainment or music to be heard. I reccommend a TV for patrons.

name: James Harrison
text: Great service. They were very busy, but very attentive. I'll definitely be back

name: Gayle Cotton
text: Very sweet and helpful efficient service in Waldron Arkansas. Drive thru and inside as well clean environment

name: Brad Nichols
text: When you order extra toppings they are really stingy with them, but they don't forget to charge you for them. I've had them do it twice, I will not be back.

name: Chris Akins
text: The pizza is okay and the staff is helpful sometimes. Their specials are good and it is actually cheaper than other fast food so altogether it isn't bad.

name: Shawn K
text: My personal favorite pizza...

name: T.j. Billy
text: The pizza was made just right and was done in just a short time.

name: Dylan Ridenhour
text: I have been eating at this estashisment all my life and in recent years, it has taken a sharp dip into the dirt. In the last 6 months alone my online orders seem like they have been barely skimmed. I have had several pizzas that have had â€¦More

name: Judy Smittle
text: Pizzas were good after we finally got them. I watched them be cut and boxed, then waited 15-20 more minutes before the server realized we were waiting for them.

name: Kenzie Hall
text: I had a beautiful time, Janet served my family and i and was so sweet. Despite being in the middle of a rush she preserved and was so nice, she really seemed to be the heart of this pizza hut she deserves a raise and a thousand gold stars. â€¦More

name: Nathan Harlow
text: Honestly, what pizza hut doesn't deliver. They'd make a fortune off truck drivers. But nice place, nice people

name: Seth Akins
text: Great service excellent pizza

name: Marsha Button
text: Worst pizza I've ever had.  3rd time I've ordered there and order was wrong. Very little sauce and ordered extra pepperoni and hardly had any. Ordered cheese bread sticks, got plain and over done.

name: Barbara Wallace
text: 10:30 pizza run on June 2nd.. Great friendly service with a smile. Thanks Guys

name: Chris Brown
text: It sucks  we waited  15 minutes  for  service  no one else was  in  there .they looked at us and walked  to the  back will never go back and suggest  that  no one else  does

name: John Totuszynski
text: Dough wasn't cooked all the way through

name: Roy Riley
text: Great food friendly service

name: Natalei Rhodes
text: I CALLED THEM AND THEY HUNG UP!!!!!!!!ðŸ˜ ðŸ˜ ðŸ˜

name: Cherry Southern
text: Great food, clean, freindly staff

name: Teri Brothers
text: Good service and good food.

name: Thomas Guinnip
text: We are students at a track meet and we asked a simple question to Mr."Rubin" and he answered in a very rude tone that they di not deliver. A simple "No" would have been sufficient. If no stars was an option, thats what id give

name: Peggy Mahan
text: Food was fresh & hot ! Service was EXCELLENT !  Way to go Allie ! Next time we are this way, we will eat with you !

name: Eliana Riddle
text: Luv it. Can't wait till they get delivery service coming soon.

name: James grigsby
text: Wonderful, fast and friendly wait staff. Food was great

name: Mandy Cox
text: Best pizza hut ever! Awesome manager, awesome service!

name: Redbear 225
text: On point service fast clean restaurant stopped in after digging for crystals with the fam

name: Jennifer Stanley
text: Cause its freakin awesome when u got the munchies!

name: connie couch
text: Service sucked& pizza just mediocre

name: Annie Theroux
text: Love the puzza here

name: Brian Tally
text: Another Pizza Hut that will not deliver.  Even after offering a huge tip.  My gosh 20 trucks sitting a half a mile away.  Ridiculous !!!!

name: theodore white
text: Great service good peoples

name: Michael Trampp
text: Nasty food

name: Hope Williams
text: Very friendly and service is quick

name: Shelley Freeman
text: Excellent

text: Good pizza and delivered as promised.

name: deborah silvey
text: Great

name: Ray Hart
text: Yet another pizza Hut that doesn't deliver. No wonder that they are my chain pizza of last resort( subpar food and even worse service)
